column1: ### Values for fuel prices are pulled from the 2022 AEO for the 2021 year in $2021 (https://www.eia.gov/outlooks/aeo/data/browser/#/?id=3-AEO2022&cases=ref2022&sourcekey=0)
### Note that the "primary_fuel" column here should match those in plant_cost.csv
